name: subcategory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(in a system for dividing things according to appearance, quality, etc.) a category (= a type, or a group of things having some features that are the same) that is part of another category : Each category is broken down into six subcategories. Quiz shows are a special subcategory of game shows.
More examplesFewer examplesScientists can now classify tumours into smaller subcategories.Within these broad categorizations there are also a number of subcategories.Spinal cord stimulation is a subcategory of neurostimulation.
